description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Geographical, Historical, Commercial, and Agricultural View of the United States of America; forming a complete Emigrant's Directory ... Likewise, an account of the British possessions in Upper and Lower Canada ... Accompanied by a whole sheet map of the United States, etc. [By Daniel Blowe.]", "Appendix. Descriptions, Travels and Topography" Contributor: BLOWE, Daniel. Author: United States of America Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.c.18." Page: 386 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1820 Publisher: Edwards & Knibb Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003734234 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
